link:linkbase.xsi:schemaLocation: http://www.xbrl.org/2003/linkbase http://www.xbrl.org/2003/xbrl-linkbase-2003-12-31.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/generic http://www.xbrl.org/2008/generic-link.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/boolean http://www.xbrl.org/2008/boolean-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/formula http://www.xbrl.org/2008/formula.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/consistency http://www.xbrl.org/2008/consistency-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/existence http://www.xbrl.org/2008/existence-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/value http://www.xbrl.org/2008/value-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/variable http://www.xbrl.org/2008/variable.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/period http://www.xbrl.org/2008/period-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/concept http://www.xbrl.org/2008/concept-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/tuple http://www.xbrl.org/2008/tuple-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/dimension http://www.xbrl.org/2008/dimension-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/general http://www.xbrl.org/2008/general-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/label http://www.xbrl.org/2008/generic-label.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/validation http://www.xbrl.org/2008/validation.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/unit http://www.xbrl.org/2008/unit-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2010/message http://www.xbrl.org/2010/generic-message.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/match http://www.xbrl.org/2008/match-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2010/filter/aspect-cover http://www.xbrl.org/2010/aspect-cover-filter.xsd

variable:precondition.test: $V1 = 'Domestic bank without overseas branches' or $V1= 'Foreign bank'

generic:link.msg:message: 1. Value in "Loan Sales" is mandatory for domestic operations 2. Value in "Loan Securitized" is mandatory for domestic operations. 3. Value in "To ARC" is mandatory for domestic operations 4. Value in "To others" is mandatory for domestic operations 5. Value in "With ARC" is mandatory for domestic operations 6. Value in "With others" is mandatory for domestic operations 7. Value in "All others" is mandatory for domestic operations 8. Value in "Total (1+2+3)" is mandatory for domestic operations

Identity "Net Overseas daily placements as on date" = (Gross overseas daily placements as on date - Gross daily overseas borrowings (excluding Head Office borrowings for Tier I and II Capital purposes) as on date) do not tally

Identity "Value of Net average daily outstanding placements over year to date" = (Average daily gross placements over year to date - Average daily gross borrowings over year to date (excluding Head Office borrowings for Tier I and II Capital purposes)) do not tally

va:valueAssertion.test: (not(empty( $V1 ))) and (not(empty( $V2 ))) and (not(empty( $V3 ))) and (not(empty( $V4 ))) and (not(empty( $V5 ))) and (not(empty( $V6 ))) and (not(empty( $V7 ))) and (not(empty( $V8 )))

generic:link.msg:message: 1. Value in "Loan Sales" is mandatory for Overseas operations 2. Value in "Loan Securitized" is mandatory for Overseas operations 3. Value in "To ARC" is mandatory for Overseas operations 4. Value in "To others" is mandatory for Overseas operations 5. Value in "With ARC" is mandatory for Overseas operations 6. Value in "With others" is mandatory for Overseas operations 7. Value in "All others" is mandatory for Overseas operations 8. Value in "Total (1+2+3)" is mandatory for Overseas operations
Reporting of "Amount of Loans Sold/ Securitised" is mandatory
Reporting of "Gain/Loss from Sale/Securitisation " is mandatory
Validation not satisfied: Gross Overseas Daily Placements Mandatory to be reported.
Reporting of "Average Daily Gross Placements" is mandatory
Validation not satisfied: Gross Daily Overseas Borrowings Mandatory to be reported.
Reporting of "Average Daily Gross Borrowings" is mandatory
Validation not satisfied: Net Overseas Daily Placements Mandatory to be reported.
Validation not satisfied: Net Average Daily Outstanding Placements Mandatory to be reported.
Reporting of "Minimum Capital Requirement To Maintain Regulatory CRAR" is mandatory
Validation not satisfied: Higher of (iii) (a) and (iii) (b) as a percentage of (iv) Mandatory to be reported.
